data.message: G shocks are hot I get compliments on mine all the time. People I know that are known for dressing well wear them. U lame ass people blasting this must not know how to dress!!!

replies.message: Bro that crappy digital crap isn't cool improve ur skills

What ever u say! Improve my skills??? U need to get with current trends. Everybody who dresses we'll is wearing g shocks. If your wearing a suite going to a funeral or wedding u obviously aren't wearing one. Just because it's digital it's crap?? What sense does that make???
i will pay 150dollar for the one that can help me to get one. ill pay for everything. just text me... i live in Europe and i would pay high to the one that heps me. please text me
Just go online. They are not hard to find.

Bro you're a fuckin faggot Brian. "Everybody that dresses well" hahaha dude fuck the current trends. Fuck everything you live your life for. Society doesn't chain me. I dress how i want to dress and other mother fuckers copy it. Instead of following, try leading.

First off watch your language tough guy talking shit on a FB Post.  U don't know the first thing about me you little punk. I guarantee u wouldn't have the balls to call me that to my face. U are a clown. U can dress how ever u want I don't recall telling anyone how they have to dress. U must have an unfulfilling life to have to attack someone's character in here who u do t even know.
